context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Root Canal T,
review:
Total satisfaction with the treatment provided. Very professional and a good doctor. 
All modern equipments are available with helpful staff. 
Dr. Shilpa Explained the issue and accordingly treated without and delay. 
Doctor is very prompt in emergency situations.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It was a great experience with Dr.Shilpa. She is very good with her work,  I went there to do cleaning n filling but she told me I had to go for root canal in one of my tooth, I was really scared to get it done but she made me feel  really comfortable telling me that it was painless and it actually was from what I was expecting to be. I recommend all of you to go to her clinic if you are looking for a good dentist and moreover  her clinic was very peaceful n hygienic aswell. Thank you Dr. Shilpa  Bharti.  

From Levis
reply_text: It was nice treating you Leviâ€™s

review: dr shilpa is a fab doctor , my child chipped her front   tooth  after a fall , dr shilpa calmed my ver very nervous 10 year old & ensured that even a local anesthesia injection doesnâ€™t hurt her . thankyou doctor ur the best

I got to know about doctors clinic through practo and I wanted to take a second opinion of a consultation I got last week which said I have 8 cavities. The doctors not only shared that I have just 4 but also explained everything very well in a manner that would ease stress. So i decided to get it done here itself. Pain was minimal. I liked the clinic spacious and well lit just like my childhood dentists clinic and with great ambient music.
